name: Sauteed Shrimp with Garlic, Lemon, and White Wine
author: Dave
summary: Sauteed shrimp--unbelievably simple, unbelievably good. Use whatever size shrimp you like.
ingredients: 3  scallions, white bulbs and green tops cut separately into thin slices
½ teaspoon ground black pepper, or more to taste
directions: Place 1/4 cup oil, scallion whites, garlic, and oregano in a large skillet or wok over medium heat
Cook, stirring often, until the oil starts to simmer, about 5 minutes
Add shrimp and increase heat to high
Cook, stirring and turning often, until opaque, 4 to 5 minutes
Add lemon juice and wine to the skillet; simmer for about 1 1/2 minutes
Add water, pepper, and salt; cook for 30 seconds
Stir in butter, 1 tablespoon olive oil, scallion greens, and parsley until even distributed
Arrange the shrimp on warmed plates and spoon the sauce on top
